```{r}
data = 
  tibble(file_name = list.files(path = './data')) %>% 
  mutate(name = map(.x = str_c("./data/", file_name),~read_csv(.x))) %>% 
  unnest() %>% 
  mutate(file_name = str_replace(file_name, ".csv", "")) %>% 
  separate(file_name, into = c("group", "id"), sep = "_")
```
